name: WindowToolbarStyle
desc: A specification for the appearance and behavior of a windowâ€™s toolbar.

items.name: static var expanded: ExpandedWindowToolbarStyle
items.desc: A window toolbar style which displays its title bar area above the toolbar.

items.name: static var unified: UnifiedWindowToolbarStyle
items.desc: A window toolbar style which displays its toolbar and title bar inline.

items.name: static func unified(showsTitle: Bool) -> UnifiedWindowToolbarStyle
items.desc: A window toolbar style which displays its toolbar and title bar inline.

items.name: static var unifiedCompact: UnifiedCompactWindowToolbarStyle
items.desc: A window toolbar style similar to unified, but with a more compact vertical sizing.

items.name: static func unifiedCompact(showsTitle: Bool) -> UnifiedCompactWindowToolbarStyle
items.desc: A window toolbar style similar to unified, but with a more compact vertical sizing.

items.name: struct ExpandedWindowToolbarStyle
items.desc: A window toolbar style which displays its title bar area above the toolbar.

items.name: struct UnifiedWindowToolbarStyle
items.desc: A window toolbar style which displays its toolbar and title bar inline.

items.name: struct UnifiedCompactWindowToolbarStyle
items.desc: A window toolbar style similar to unified, but with a more compact vertical sizing.
